"speed-limit-up-enabled" | boolean | true means enabled "start-added-torrents" | boolean | true means added torrents will be started right away "trash-original-torrent-files" | boolean | true means the .torrent file of added torrents will be deleted "units" | object | see below "version" | string | long version string "$version ($revision)"
